> APIs


* [InnerSecret](#innersecret) - Account inner secret service.


	* [GetSecretInfo (/account/inner/secret/info)](#getsecretinfo) - Get token info.





<h2 id="innersecret">InnerSecret</h2>

>  Account inner secret service.



<h3 id="getsecretinfo">GetSecretInfo</h3>

>  Get token info.



* HTTP Gateway

	* URL: `/account/inner/secret/info`
	* Method: `GET`


* Request Type: ***Secret***

>  Account secret.

|Field|proto type|JSON type|Comment|Default|Required|
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|token|string|string| Account token|-|true|






* Response Type: ***SecretInfo***

>  Token secret info.

|Field|proto type|JSON type|Comment|Default|Required|
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|account_id|string|string| Account ID|-|true|
|device_id|string|string| Device ID|-|true|
|level|enum [TokenLevel](#tokenlevel)|string/integer| Token access level|-|true|



> JSON Demo

```json
{
  "account_id": "string",
  "device_id": "string",
  "level": "NONE_TOKEN (0) | GUEST_TOKEN (100) | LOW_TOKEN (200) | MIDDLE_TOKEN (300) | HIGH_TOKEN (400) | INNER_TOKEN (999)"
}
```






********

## *Embed Messages*





<h3 id="tokenlevel">TokenLevel</h3>

>  Method token level.

* Enum

|Name (string)|Value (integer)|Comment|
|---|---|---|
|NONE_TOKEN|0| Public access|
|GUEST_TOKEN|100| Guest token|
|LOW_TOKEN|200| Lower token, for h5, web|
|MIDDLE_TOKEN|300| Middle token, for pc|
|HIGH_TOKEN|400| High token, for native app|
|INNER_TOKEN|999| For server internal|
